thread.section_title: CoolFrames.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CoolFrames.com | www.coolframes.com | 6 of 16
thread.title: Daria Coneghan

author: Daria Coneghan
title: Daria Coneghan
text: I really like these frames, for my first set of glasses I am surprised at how light and comfortable they are. I knew what I was getting because I tried them on in a store for $80 more. There was a bit of a mix-up in the free cleaning kit which I was charged for. The charges were reversed but the kit still isn't here. They did say it was back ordered so I'm not concerned. Staff are awesome to deal with.
